resources.string: By creating an account or signing you certify that you are 16 years or older and your agree to our privacy policy and terms and conditions
You will need an account to [related content]

Your password can contain:
 -Minimum of 8 characters
 -At least 2 out of 3 types of charecters Letters 
 (a-z or (A- Z) digits (0-9) or symbols (*^%)
I would like to receive periodic offers and updates from philips
When you are ready.Please check your email to activate your account
You can continue to use the app in the meantime

When your ready. Please check your email to actviate your account
You can use the app in the meantime
Press "Resend" button if you not received an email
